mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT idx, title, context, name, regidate, hit, imgfile, datediff(dd, regidate, getdate()) reg_diff, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY idx DESC) AS rownum FROM t_notice (nolock) ) AS NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_notice (title, context, name, regidate, hit, imgfile) VALUES (#{title}, #{context}, #{name}, getdate(), 0, #{imgfile})
